house_listing.house_description: Elegant home in prestigious Estates at StoneyCreek. Unexcelled quality. Oak flooring.Spacious great room. Gourmet kitchen w/ islandand ceramic flr. Unfin walkout bsmt prepped forfull bath. Walking distance to Stoney Crk Park.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Den, Dining Room, Living Room, Master Bedroom

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Ceiling Fan(s), Eat In Kitchen, Great Room, Laundry Room, Sprinklers
